articles.description: West Indies host England in the fourth men’s T20 at Beausejour Stadium, Gros Islet – follow text updates.

articles.description: Follow live text commentary of Chris Billam-Smith vs Gilberto Ramirez in a cruiserweight unification fight in Saudi Arabia.

articles.description: South Africa prove too strong for England at Twickenham's Allianz Stadium, as Cheslin Kolbe scores twice in a nine-point win.
articles.title: England 20-29 South Africa: Hosts lose at Allianz Stadium

articles.description: Arsenal forward Kai Havertz is among the goalscorers as Germany thrash Bosnia-Herzegovina to claim a record Nations League victory and win Group A3 with a game to spare.
articles.title: Germany 7-0 Bosnia-Herzegovina: Kai Havertz among scorers in record Nations League win

articles.description: France fight back to edge out New Zealand, inflicting their first defeat of the Autumn Nations Series campaign.
articles.title: France 30-29 New Zealand: Hosts inflict All Blacks' first autumn loss

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Turkey vs Wales in the Uefa Nations League.
articles.title: Turkey vs Wales LIVE: Uefa Nations League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Katie Taylor and Amanda Serrano produce another classic before a reported 120 million watch the farcical Mike Tyson v Jake Paul event.
articles.title: Tyson vs Paul: Katie Taylor & Amanda Serrano save farcical main event

articles.description: If this is Chelsea in a new era under Sonia Bompastor, it seems they are heading in the same direction as their previous one - towards more success.
articles.title: 'Everything is almost perfect' - Chelsea send message as they beat Man City

articles.description: Darcy Graham equals Duhan van der Merwe's Scotland try-scoring record in a comfortable nine-try victory over Portugal at Murrayfield.
articles.title: Autumn Nations Series: Nine-try Scotland beat dogged Portugal
